content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, as we only discuss the rental price here, let me start with a higher proposition. The apartment in Duisburg is available for a monthly rent of 1200 Euros. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! However, if you wish to negotiate further or decline this offer, kindly provide your revised figure or reason respectively. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
